Items.Title: Oversight - The Roles of the Federal Emergency Management Agency and other Federal Agencies in providing financial disaster assistance to New York City in the wake of the September 11th attacks.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending:  Miller, Quinn, Rodriguez, Freed and Reed.
